segments.advisor_message: So, imagine you're on a roller coaster, right? There's ups and downs, and sometimes it's a little scary. That's kinda like investing, you gotta expect those drops and flips. Just like with the roller coaster, you can’t predict every twist and turn, but you can buckle up and prepare!
segments.client_message: Umm, I think I get it, but like, isn’t investing supposed to be more stable? I don’t wanna be on a crazy roller coaster with my money. I mean, how much could I lose if it goes down like, a lot?
